Key Match Events: Ja Morant helped the team to a gutsy 126-124 victory in their season-opener at Utah on Wednesday, finishing with 22 points, on 7-of-12 shooting, 10 assists and five rebounds in 28 minutes.
Pre-Game Insights: Ja Morant is excited to be playing once again after a campaign that saw him limited to just nine games because of a league-imposed suspension followed by a season-ending shoulder injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant shared his thoughts on being back on the court and his expectations for the new season, stating 'I was just excited to be back out there. These guys trust and believe in me every time I'm out there on the floor, so it's only right I go out there and play free.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nike 'Nightmare' Ja 2s are out, built for stability, lightweight traction, and fanged Morant.
Ja Morant debuted the 'Nightmare' Ja 2s in their season-opener against the Utah Jazz on Wednesday.
Others: The Grizzlies are looking to bounce back after a rough campaign last time around.
The sneakers were released in time for Halloween as well as the start of the new NBA season.
